item.title: About Me üôãüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
item.description: Hi, I’m Yihan, New Media Master Student at Aalto University, a Designer & Maker !üí° üì¶ I’m keen on creating 3D visuals with physical objects, and have basic coding abilities, thus I’m able to design and create interactive installations on my own. Interactive Installation, 3D Art(Modeling & Animation), UX Design, Product Design, Digital/Visual Design, Illustration/Branding ü§î Always open to learn and practice new things, discovering in life, and with my power to create delightful PROJECTS :D EDUCATION MA in New Media (2023-2025)– Art and Media, Aalto University, Finland BEng in Industrial Design (2018-2022)– Design and Innovation (D&I), Tongji University, China SKILLS TECHNOLOGY – Blender, Touchdesigner, Unity(basic C#|Art), Figma, HTML+CSS+JS(Junior), Substance Painter, Rhino, Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere, After Effect, Office, Manual making DESIGN – Research & Concept Development, Physical Computing, Generative Systems, Creative Coding, Interaction Design, Immersive Mapping LANGUAGE – Chinese (Native), English (IELTS-7.
